imagenes.descripcion: The Double Headed Sheet Metal Nibbler China is a metal cutter with drill attachment. It comes with an additional punch and die, a cutting hole attachment and a step drill bit. This tool is perfect for cutting straights, curves and circles. The color of this particular model is gold.
NIUPIKA 2KG Chinese metal melting furnace is a small jewelry melting equipment. It has a power of 1400W and can reach temperatures up to 1100â„ƒ. It is suitable for 220V and 110V power supply.

Metal carving tool set, this collection of stamping tools composed of metal gouges and chisels is suitable for jewelry. These tools are typically used for carving and working on metal surfaces. They are often used by jewelers, artisans and craft enthusiasts to create intricate designs and patterns on various metal surfaces.

Autolock metal burnisher is an electric polishing machine designed for polishing metals and stainless steel. It comes with 4 honing wheels, which can be used to achieve different levels of polish on the metal surface. This tool is often used in metalworking and fabrication shops for finishing and polishing metal surfaces.

The iCrimp stainless steel cable tie tool is a handy device designed to clamp and cut stainless steel cable ties. It is manufactured with a metal zipper gun rack tensioner, which allows for precise tensioning of cable ties. The tool also includes an integrated cutter for easy trimming of excess cable tie length. In addition, a release tool is included, which can be used to undo cable ties if necessary. This tool is especially useful in various industries, such as construction, manufacturing and telecommunications, where safe and durable cable management is essential.

The Tungsten Electrode Sharpener is a specialized Chinese tool for TIG welding. It allows you to sharpen tungsten electrodes to a precise point, cut the contaminated portion of the electrode and accommodate electrodes of various sizes and lengths. It is essential for welders to maintain welding machine performance and weld quality.

50Pcs Fiberglass Tool Abrasive 32mm Cutting Disc with 4Pcs Mandrels is a set designed for use with Dremel and other rotary tools. These discs are made of fiberglass abrasive material that can effectively cut various types of metal. The set also includes 4 mandrels, which are used to hold the cutting discs in place during operation. This makes it a versatile accessory for your rotary tool, enhancing its functionality for metal cutting tasks.

The universal metal hole opener for RC car body 0-14 mm is a tool designed to expand or drill holes in the body of a remote control (RC) car. It is made of metal, which ensures durability and longevity. The tool can create holes from 0 to 14 mm, making it versatile for various applications. This tool is particularly useful for hobbyists and professionals who are into RC car modifications or repairs.

Knife Makers Edge Line Scriber, also known as Center Scribe, is a tool used in knife making and other metalworking crafts. It is made of aluminum, making it lightweight yet durable. The tool has a hardened fine tip that is used to mark or scribe lines on the cutting edge of a knife blade or other metal surfaces. These lines serve as a guide for subsequent processes such as sharpening. This tool is an essential piece of equipment for knifemakers, as it helps ensure accuracy and symmetry in their work.

The KAKA INDUSTRIAL 8 MINI is an 8 inch mini shear and brake combination hand tool. This compact, high quality device is designed for precision sheet metal work. It combines the functionality of a shear and a brake, allowing it to cut and bend sheet metal with ease. This makes it a versatile tool for a variety of industrial applications.

The stainless steel finger ring cutter is a professional tool used by jewelers and emergency personnel. It is equipped with a wheel blade designed to cut metal rings without causing damage to the finger. This tool is especially useful for jewelers when resizing or repairing rings. In emergency situations, firefighters or paramedics can use it to remove a ring from a swollen or injured finger.

Handy Craft mini metal saws are compact tools designed for precision cutting tasks in a variety of craft and model making projects. These saws are particularly useful for intricate work where larger saws may not be suitable. They feature razor-sharp blades that can cut a variety of materials, such as metal, wood and plastic.

Custom aluminum tool tray made for tool storage, typically in a workshop or garage. It is custom made, which means it can be designed for specific tools or for a specific space. Being made of aluminum, it is lightweight yet durable and resistant to rust and corrosion. This makes it ideal for use in environments where it may be exposed to moisture or chemicals. The tray can be equipped with various compartments or sections to effectively organize tools.

The AMZCNC hydraulic drilling kit is a powerful tool designed to create holes in electrical conduit or sheet metal. It is a hydraulic tool, which means it uses fluid pressure to generate force, making it capable of drilling holes in tough materials. The kit includes punches and dies for 1/2-inch to 2-inch holes, making it versatile for a variety of applications. This tool is especially useful for electricians, plumbers and other professionals who routinely work with ductwork or sheet metal.

The Cloudray 1500 W portable laser welder is a powerful tool designed for welding carbon, stainless steel and other metals. It operates at a wavelength of 1070 nm, ideal for metal welding. This machine is portable, making it practical for a variety of applications. It is especially useful for professionals in the manufacturing and construction industries.

The China ARC 5500 W welder is a hand-held electric welding tool. It includes a ground cable and a metal clamp for safe and efficient welding. This machine is designed for ARC welding (arc welding), a process that uses an electric arc to melt and join metals. It is especially useful for professionals in the manufacturing and construction industries.

The bench shear for wire and sheet metal is a tool designed to cut wire and sheet metal. It is normally used in a workshop and is placed on a bench to maintain stability during use. This tool is especially useful for professionals in the manufacturing and construction industries.

The three-station edge roller is a tool designed to bend metal roofing materials at angles ranging from 0 to 90 degrees. It is suitable for 29- to 22-gauge steel, making it versatile for a variety of applications. The tool can perform bends from 16 to 102mm, allowing for a wide range of bend sizes. This tool is especially useful for construction and manufacturing professionals, especially those working with metal roofing materials.

The China seven function forming machine is a specialized tool used in the production of air ducts. It is designed to perform seven different functions, making it a versatile tool for various applications in the air duct manufacturing process. This machine is especially useful for professionals in the heating, ventilation and air conditioning (HVAC) industry.

Metal stamps with Native American designs are tools used in jewelry. These large steel stamps feature Native American tribal-style designs, reflecting the rich cultural heritage of Native American tribes. They are often used to stamp these designs into metal surfaces, creating unique pieces of Southwestern-style jewelry. The stamps have a 3/8 tool shank, making them easy to handle and use.

The Mrobas C5A2 Impact Power Assisted Crimper & Drive Shaft is an improved edition of a sheet metal crimper. This tool is designed to make the sheet metal crimping process more efficient and less labor intensive. It features an assisted mechanism that reduces the amount of manual force required to crimp the metal. The drive shaft is a key component of this tool, as it transfers power from the motor to the crimping mechanism. This tool is especially useful for professionals in the construction and manufacturing industries.

The VEVOR permanent magnetic steel hoist is a powerful tool designed for lifting and moving heavy metal objects. It uses a neodymium magnet, which is one of the strongest types of permanent magnets available. This magnetic lifter has a lifting capacity ranging from 100 kg to 2000 kg, making it versatile for various applications in construction and other industries. The tool works like a crane hoist, using magnetic force to hold the metal object and a mechanical system to lift and move the object.

The 26-piece steel punch set is a tool designed for shaping jewelry and other small metal parts. The set includes punches ranging in size from 2.3 MM to 25 MM, making it versatile for a variety of applications. These tools are typically used in jewelry and metalworking.

The manual metal shear is a labor-saving tool designed for cutting sheet metal. It is as effective as an electric metal shear, but requires no electricity, making it portable and convenient for use in a variety of locations. This tool is quick and easy to adjust, and is suitable for sheet metal less than 20GA.
